classes.title: Intro To Acrylics: Monochromatic Painting
classes.project_title: The project for this class is to use just one colour plus white to create form by accurately analysing and placing tonal values.  Download the photo resource so you can paint along with me.

classes.title: Learn C4D and Adobe Photoshop - Abstract Poster II
classes.project_title: Welcome back, everyone! In this class, I will guide you through the making of a poster with C4D and Photoshop!  We will explore the modifiers in C4d as well using HDRI as a background!
